maxValue.title: Maximum Value
maxValue.description: Maximum amount established in the Expenditure Budget of Mexico City corresponding to the respective fiscal year

procurementID.title: procurement ID
procurementID.description: Control number assigned internally to the purchase procedure. This information must be in the requisition form.

requiredAuthorizationType.title: Required Authorization Type
requiredAuthorizationType.description: the type of the authorization required or null if no authorization is required

advancePayment.title: Advance Payment
advancePayment.description: The purchase procedure includes an advance.

advancePaymentPercent.title: Advance Payment Percent
advancePaymentPercent.description: The percentage of advance that the purchase procedure considers

tenderNature.title: Tender Nature
tenderNature.description: This field is only for public bidding and can take three different values: National, International Open and International by treaties. The nature of a call defines the possible contestants

article54FractionException.title: Article 54 Fraction Exception
article54FractionException.description: Fraction of article 54 of the Procurement Law for Mexico City that justifies the exception to the tender

fiscalYearResources.title: fiscalYearResources
fiscalYearResources.description: Fiscal year to which the resources to be exected belong

desertedBiddingID.title: Deserted Bidding ID
desertedBiddingID.description: An exception is made to the tender for the cases provided for in Section IV article 54 of the Procurement Law for Mexico City

desertedBiddingChiefAuthorizationDate.title: Deserted Bidding Chief Authorization Date
desertedBiddingChiefAuthorizationDate.description: Date on which the head of the Unit,issues the authorization to the exception of the tender.

desertedBiddingCommitteeAuthorizationDat.title: Deserted Bidding Committee Authorization Date
desertedBiddingCommitteeAuthorizationDat.description: Date on which the Procurement Committee or Subcommittee of the Unit, issues the authorization to the exception of the tender.

invitationDate.title: Invitation Date
invitationDate.description: date on which the invitation to participate in the purchase procedure is extended to individuals or companies.

requisitionNumber.title: Requisition Number
requisitionNumber.description: Number or requisition page assigned internally in the Dependencies, Decentralized Bodies, Delegations or Entities.

requisitionDate.title: Requisition Date
requisitionDate.description: Date on which the requesting area makes the purchase request

biddingAmendmentsAfterClarifications.title: Bidding Amendments After Clarifications
biddingAmendmentsAfterClarifications.description: Were the rules of the bidding modified after the clarification meeting?

desertedBidding.title: Deserted Bidding
desertedBidding.description: inform if the bidding was declared deserted

desertedBiddingCauses.title: Deserted Bidding Causes
desertedBiddingCauses.description: Grounds for which the contest was declared deserted

disqualifiedTenderers.title: disqualifiedTenderers
disqualifiedTenderers.description: Number of suppliers disqualified for failing to meet any requirement

hasAuction.title: Has Auction
hasAuction.description: describes if an auction was held
